channel.title: Help me
channel.description:
I need help stopping or removing weather, Also I need help on to remove summoning.
Help me plz.

item.title: Help me
item.dc:creator: @legendzpker legendzpker
item.description:
@legendzpker wrote:

i dont have a clue if u find out tell me because im making a new server and i need to know for lagg reasons

Read full topic

item.title: Help me
item.dc:creator: @kilermage3 kilermage3
item.description:
@kilermage3 wrote:

Le Hawtz:

go to the data folder, and find weather, it says “weather =” replace whatever number follows that with 0 for no weather, a number 1-6 to apply dif weathers, not recomended, causes lag

I did this and it worked.

[quote=“legendzpker, post:4, topic:64446”][center][size=10pt]Don’t like that snow? The dense fog covering your screen?
Dislike to restart each weather change?[/size][/center]

Purpose: ^

Difficulty: Easy - Really short

Assumed Knowledge: Copy and Paste

Server Base: PimpScape, any server with weather - I used a default PimpScape

Class Modified: Client.java

Procedure:
Step 1:
First, find:

public static int Weather[] = {1,1,3,3,3,3,3,3,3,3,3,5};

Step 2:
Second, replace with mines:

public static int Weather[] = {3,3,3,3,3,3,3,3,3};

Done :).
Clear skies.

Credits: 100% me
im fed up beting u all at tut making lolz have fun with no weather.

post if it helpes u it should[/quote]
Someone told me to do this but when I did I still had weather. But now I know how to get rid of it.

Also How do I remove summoning…???

Read full topic

item.title: Help me
item.dc:creator: @legendzpker legendzpker
item.description:
@legendzpker wrote:

[center][size=10pt]Don’t like that snow? The dense fog covering your screen?
Dislike to restart each weather change?[/size][/center]

Purpose: ^

Difficulty: Easy - Really short

Assumed Knowledge: Copy and Paste

Server Base: PimpScape, any server with weather - I used a default PimpScape

Class Modified: Client.java

Procedure:
Step 1:
First, find:

public static int Weather[] = {1,1,3,3,3,3,3,3,3,3,3,5};

Step 2:
Second, replace with mines:

public static int Weather[] = {3,3,3,3,3,3,3,3,3};

Done :).
Clear skies.

Credits: 100% me
im fed up beting u all at tut making lolz have fun with no weather.

post if it helpes u it should
